price: ورته وايه زه خو يو وېروونكى يم، او كوم بل لایق د عبادت نشته پرته له يوه برلاسي الله څخه.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
